name: Tomb Raider Concept
description:
Another blockout completed in UE5!

This time, its based of Shadow Of The Tomb Raider. A fully playable experience.  I would love to hear any bits of feedback you may have! 

If you would like to get in contact, please connect with me on Linkedin!

https://www.linkedin.com/in/milescarr/

Controls:

E - Pickup  weapons, torch and ammo.

Walking towards climbing points or ladders will automatically let you start climbing.

W A S D - General Movement

Alt - Crouch

Shift - Sprint

RMB - Aim       LMB - Fire

Middle Mouse Button - Sneak Mode
